challenge-unlock.content: Play all the challenges to unlock more!

challenge1.content: Use any blocks to get the hamster to the carrot!

challenge10.content: How are you going to get up and back?

challenge11.content: Whoa I have no idea how you're going to do this one.

challenge12.content: Can you sneak up and through all the gaps?

challenge2.content: You'll maybe need some triangles or squares to get to the carrot!

challenge3.content: Use triangles to get up and down the stairs!

challenge4.content: You may need to make some ramps this time!

challenge5.content: Can you use triangles to get up high to the carrot?

challenge6.content: How are you going to get across that big gap?

challenge7.content: Can you climb the wall and get to the carrot?

challenge8.content: Can you get them each to a carrot?

challenge9.content: You may need to stop half way to move the blocks!

createlocked.content: Play more if you want to build your own challenges.

fail-redesign.content: All builders have to redesign sometimes!
Try building it a little differently.

fail-soclose.content: So close! You might have to move some things around.

free-buildown.content: Build your own challenge, then see if your hamster can get the carrot!

free-place.content: You can place hamsters and food anywhere you want.

free-restart.content: Tap the trash to start over.

free-tapundo.content: Tap "Undo" to take away the last thing you added.

free-blocksbutton.content: Tap the button with the blocks to choose some to build with.

free-foodbutton.content: Tap the carrot button to choose food for your hamster.

free-hamsterbutton.content: Tap the hamster button to choose one.

free-tapgo.content: Don't forget to tap "Go" when you're ready to let the hamster run.

gameintro.content: Uh oh! These hamsters can't reach their carrots.
Let's build a way for these hamsters to get their food.

gameover-fulltummies.content: These hamsters have full tummies from all the food you helped them collect. Great designing!

gameover-nicebuilding.content: You did them all! Nice building!

hamster-earn.content: Choose a hamster you want to play with!
Earn more hamsters by playing more!

hamster-more.content: You can earn more hamsters by unlocking new challenges.

hamster-new3.content: Look at that! A new one!

hamster-new4.content: Now that's a cool lookin' hamster.

hamster-new5.content: That's a good looking hamster right there.

hamster-new6.content: I like the hamster. Well done.

hamster-new7.content: Nice looking hamster you got there.

intro-differentway.content: Can you think of a different way to get the carrot?

intro-othershapes.content: What other shapes can you use this time?

intro-stackblocks.content: Try to stack the blocks differently to get the carrot and the super snack!

praise5.content: That is a masterpiece of design!

praise6.content: That is some awesome trail building!

start-over.content: Do you want to start over?

start4.content: Let's get ready to rock and or possibly roll.

success-nobonus.content: You got the carrot but not the super snack.
Want to try again or do the next challenge?

success-redesign.content: Redesign your building to get the carrot and the super snack!

success-tryagain.content: This time, collect the super snack  on your way to the carrot.

tutorial-bridge.content: Use the plank to build a bridge from one tower to the other.

tutorial-combine.content: Use two shapes to make one big ramp!

tutorial-pause1.content: Tap the pause button to stop your hamster from running.

tutorial-plank.content: Lean the plank on a block so the hamster can climb.

tutorial-play1.content: Tap "Go" when you’re ready to let the hamster run.

tutorial-play3.content: Tap your hamster or "Go" when you’re ready to let the hamster run.

tutorial-square.content: Use only the square blocks to help the hamster get the carrot.

tutorial-tapordrag.content: Tap or drag the blocks on to the board.
Drag them off to remove them.

tutorial-triangle.content: Use the triangle as a ramp to help the hamster climb.
A ramp is like a slide that joins a high place to a low one.

tutorial-tube.content: The hamster can run through the tube.  Try it!

tutorial-undo.content: Keeping tapping "Undo" to take away all your blocks, one at a time.

unlocked.content: Now you can create your own challenges or just keep playing!

unlocked_lastlevel.content: Create your own challenges or just keep playing!
